biotools.summary: An integrated system that supports all steps of computational ChIP-seq data analysis and supersedes the laborious application of several single command line tools. It provides functionality ranging from quality assessment and -control of short reads, over the mapping of reads against a reference genome (readmapping) and the detection of enriched regions (peakdetection) to various follow-up analyses.

bioschemas.name: CASSys
